title: How to get started with Angular
description: This will show you what you need to get started when you want to start using Angular
text: To get starter you need to do some installations. What you will need to get started will be : -Download your self a code editor i recommend to get Visual Code here is the link to it: Visual Studio Code -Download node.js and to do that you need to go to: Node.js ( get the current version). -Download git here is the link to it : Git-scm -Download Angular cli you can see the original page at Angular Cli This is not a normal install but a command that use node.js to do this you can use it in the command console just type "npm install -g @angular/cli" to install it. Then when you have everything installed you will be ready to start you new angular project. If you need a step by step you can always go to YouTube here is one that i really like [video]https://www.youtube.com/embed/k5E2AVpwsko[/video]
